column5: This house has 4 bedrooms, a living room and a game room. There are 5 tv's in the home. 4 are smart tv's and they all have cable as well. It was just remodeled so it shows like new. It has 3 full baths and a brand new water heater. It is fully furnished from furniture to silverware. There is 1 queen size beds, 4 full size beds, 2 twin bunk beds and a queen size air mattress if needed. It is centrally located so it isn't far from anything you want to do in San Antonio.
